guardian.title: Isis fighters in suicide attack on Iraqi air base
Oregon governor John Kitzhaber to resign over 'surreal' corruption scandal
guardian.topComment: His ex-wife must be laughing her ass off... What a knee-slapper! He runs off with a power-hottie, 20 years his junior and now has to suffer the consequences of partnering with a corrupt manipulator. I guess it doesn't matter whether you're a Democrat...

guardian.title: Minsk ceasefire in balance as fighting escalates in eastern Ukraine
guardian.topComment: Holy cow! I am watching BBC, and they are actually talking about what had happened on Maidan! Shots fires from Hotel Ukraine, police being killed, and current administration blocking investigation into who had actually killed civilians and riot polic...
